divs: Sighting DetailsI was on the internet looking up UFOs and I heard something outside so I turned on my deck light and went outside and all I see is this big loud triangle. How come nobody hears it? I was scared as I got alot of goosebumps. I ran back inside and wanted to find somewhere i could post this. I knew it was a UFO trust me im in to extra terestrials. As it flew over me and my town I watched just suddenly dissapear but one thing was it rumbled for only 2 seconds about when i saw it than it was hovering as silent as air.
Summary: A triangle with a red sphere like thing in the middle and a very bright light at every corner making a rumbling noise
